title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official CLI and Python/JS libraries for running large language models locally with support for Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and others.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node.js and browsers to interact with the Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama models for chains, agents, and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface) with model management, chat history, and multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama offering sync/async APIs and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for integrating Ollama models into Rails or Ruby scripts.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI with syntax highlighting, chat sessions, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot alternative with inline completions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Simple React chat app that streams responses from any Ollama model via the REST API.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator nodes for RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed models and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up an Ollama service container and exposes it for CI pipelines.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack bot server that answers channel mentions using any Ollama model.
